entry.title: Department of Commerce - U.S. Census Bureau - Chief Economic Applications Division (ES 00)
entry.content:
Census is hiring for their Chief of their Economic Applications Division. Note that this job is located at their Suitland, MD location.

Salary $147,649-$221,900

Closes 2024.06.24

Apply

entry.title: Department of Health and Human Services - Centers for Disease Control and Prevention - Public Notice for Direct Hire (Data Modernization) - Data Scientist (GS 7-GS 15) (Remote)
entry.content:
The CDC has an open call for Data Scientists for a variety of roles at different levels of expertise from entry-level to super senior! You can apply to them all through this one job posting.

Salary $49,025-$186,854

Closes 2024.09.30

Apply

entry.title: Department of the Treasury - Office of the Inspector General for Tax Administration - Chief Technology Officer (GS 15) (Remote)
entry.content:
Treasury’s IG for Tax Administration is hiring for their CTO!

Salary $143,736-$191,900

Closes 2024.06.12

Apply
